Material used.Description: siRNA was used to knockdown DJ-1, while wild-type and L166P mutant DJ-1 were overexpressed in neuronal cell lines.

Readout description.Result Description: L166P mutant DJ-1 failed to rescue cell death under oxidative stress, while wild-type DJ-1 did.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 overexpression was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell survival rate â‰¥ 80% under stress conditions.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell survival rate < 60% under stress conditions.
